bike.description: Alpha Red Aluminum w/Aluminum Armor, ABP, Full Floater, alloy EVO Link, E2 tapered head tube, integrated fork stanchion bumpers, oversized pivot bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, ISCG03 mounts, 203mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Big Earl Disc wheel system, 32 hole, 20mm front hub, 150x12mm rear hub
Bontrager Big Earl, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek Frustum SE Light Edition, E2
Avid Elixir CR Carbon hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork sag meter, aluminum armor
